input_error_empty_email: It is mandatory to inform the email associated with the account
input_error_invalid_code: It is mandatory to inform the security code sent to your email
input_error_required_field: It is mandatory to fill this field
password_reset_email_help: We will send you an email with the verification code to reset your password.

tw_user_not_found: Unable to find the account associated with the provided email

reset_password_finished_help: Your password have been updated with success!
